name: ConvertXtoDVD Project File
summary: Learn about .XTODVD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To create, load, or save a project, select File â†’ Project and choose your desired action. When projects are created from scratch they are created with saved settings preloaded from when ConvertXtoDVD was first started. After you save a project, don't change the location of the source files or else the project will not load.

description: Project created and used by ConvertXtoDVD, a DVD authoring tool; contains any data related to a project, which includes source file locations, customized settings, and DVD menus; can be opened and edited at a later time.
